snippet: Rottapharm dropped plans for an offering, saying unfavorable market conditions led to “a rapid change in the expectations of investors on European assets and, in particular, on Southern European assets.”
abstract: Rottapharm dropped plans for an offering, saying unfavorable market conditions led to “a rapid change in the expectations of investors on European assets and, in particular, on Southern European assets.”

headline.main: Italian Drug Maker Rottapharm Pulls Planned I.P.O.
